name: college-bazar
description: <<<<<<< HEAD  This is a web development project, an ecommerce website functioning as a platform for the college students. > We are aware of the competitors we have like bigger e-commerce websites like Quikr.com, Olx.com and we even found a similar idea from last decade which was unsuccessful named fratmart.com whose domain is now available for purchase.
author: Piyush Dwivei, Ayush Saxena
